resources.string:
The rules for who picks the cards, how they are distributed etc. are the same that the normal jass ones.

The goal of the game is to get as few points as possible. Points are gained so:
In the first round, you gain 5 points per fold you win.
In the second round, you gain 10 points per heart card you win.
In the third round, you win 20 points for every queen you win.
In the fourth round, you gain 50 points if you win the king of clubs.
In the fifth round, all these rules are mixed.
And then it is five points per fold again etc.

Good luck!
